title: What contents are suitable for 5-year-olds to watch on YouTube? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are lots of kid-friendly channels on YouTube. Off the top of my head, I can think of Blippi, CocoMelon (forgive me if I spelled that wrong), and LittleBabyBum. If you are willing to spend money, try YouTube Kids. It's much easier to control what your child watches on there.
